plot: The Lone Gunmen, with the (unwanted) aid of Morris Fletcher, must stop a destructive virus from entering the populace.

The Lone Gunman go out on a limb to try to help an old friend. In the process of trying to stop a new unkown virus, the trio seal themselves in with the terrorist to stop the spread of it. Sealing their fate, and taking themselves down with the terrorist. How will they get out of this one?—sethstephens46
